```{r echo = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
DATA <- read_csv("data/ConvertedSalts_Clean.csv")

```

Going to work on ion stuff here.

Seawater salinity = 35,000 ppm
```{r}


DATA %>% 
  filter(Measurement %in% c("CaCO3","Ca2+", "NaHCO3", "NaCl", "KCl", "Cl-", "K+", "Na+", "MgCl2")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Measurement, y = Min_Concentration_ppm))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_classic()

#length(DATA$Measurement[DATA$Measurement == "HCO3-"])
```
